nodes.text: The Marcellus system, also known as the Marca system, was a star system located in the Marcellus Nebula, within the Meerian sector of the galaxy's Outer Rim Territories. It centered around the star Marcellus.
The system was discovered roughly two centuries before the Galactic Civil War.

The system was near the Sumitra sector, as the characters in the adventure travel through the Marcellus nebula as a shortcut to reach that sector. The Essential Atlas Online Companion later listed the "Marcellus system" as "Marca system" and placed it in the Meerian sector.
